java/liquibase/change/CreateProcedureChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.OracleDatabase;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.RawSqlStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00008 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00009 import liquibase.exception.InvalidChangeDefinitionException;
00010 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00011 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00012 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00013 
00014 import java.util.Set;
00015 
00016 public class CreateProcedureChange extends AbstractChange {
00017     private String comments;
00018     private String procedureBody;
00019 
00020     public CreateProcedureChange() {
00021         super("createProcedure", "Create Procedure");
00022     }
00023 
00024     public String getProcedureBody() {
00025         return procedureBody;
00026     }
00027 
00028     public void setProcedureBody(String procedureBody) {
00029         this.procedureBody = procedureBody;
00030     }
00031 
00032     public String getComments() {
00033         return comments;
00034     }
00035 
00036     public void setComments(String comments) {
00037         this.comments = comments;
00038     }
00039 
00040     public void validate(Database database) throws InvalidChangeDefinitionException {
00041         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(procedureBody) == null) {
00042             throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("procedure text is required", this);
00043         }
00044 
00045     }
00046 
00047     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00048         String endDelimiter = ";";
00049         if (database instanceof OracleDatabase) {
00050             endDelimiter = "\n/";
00051         }
00052         return new SqlStatement[] {
00053                 new RawSqlStatement(getProcedureBody(), endDelimiter),
00054         };
00055     }
00056 
00057     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00058         return "Stored procedure created";
00059     }
00060 
00061     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00062         Element sqlElement = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement(getTagName());
00063         sqlElement.appendChild(currentChangeLogFileDOM.createTextNode(getProcedureBody()));
00064 
00065         return sqlElement;
00066     }
00067 
00068 
00069     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00070         return null;
00071     }
00072 }
